documentation.description: Arc is a data platform with multiple connection options.

drivers.name: Apache Arrow (Recommended)
drivers.notes: Recommended for production. Provides 3-5x better performance using Apache Arrow IPC.

documentation.notes: Arc supports multiple databases (schemas) within a single instance. Each Arc database appears as a schema in SQL Lab.

documentation.description: Ascend.io is a data automation platform for building data pipelines.
Amazon Athena is an interactive query service for analyzing data in S3 using SQL.

drivers.name: PyAthena (REST)
drivers.notes: No Java required. URL-encode special characters (e.g., s3:// -> s3%3A//).

drivers.name: PyAthenaJDBC
drivers.notes: Requires Amazon Athena JDBC driver.

engine_parameters.name: IAM Role Assumption
engine_parameters.description: Assume a specific IAM role for queries

documentation.notes: URL-encode special characters in s3_staging_dir (e.g., s3:// becomes s3%3A//).

documentation.description: MySQL is a popular open-source relational database.

drivers.name: mysqlclient
drivers.notes: Recommended driver. May fail with caching_sha2_password auth.

drivers.name: mysql-connector-python
drivers.notes: Required for newer MySQL databases using caching_sha2_password authentication.

documentation.description: PostgreSQL is an advanced open-source relational database.

parameters.host: For localhost: localhost or 127.0.0.1. For AWS: endpoint URL

documentation.notes: The psycopg2 library comes bundled with Superset Docker images.

documentation.description: Google BigQuery is a serverless, highly scalable data warehouse.

authentication_methods.name: Service Account JSON
authentication_methods.description: Upload service account credentials JSON or paste in Secure Extra

documentation.notes: Create a Service Account via GCP console with access to BigQuery datasets. For CSV/Excel uploads, also install pandas_gbq.
warnings: Google BigQuery Python SDK is not compatible with gevent. Use a worker type other than gevent when deploying with gunicorn.

documentation.description: ClickHouse is an open-source column-oriented database for real-time analytics using SQL. It's known for extremely fast query performance on large datasets.

drivers.name: clickhouse-connect (Recommended)
drivers.notes: Official ClickHouse Python driver with native protocol support.

drivers.name: clickhouse-sqlalchemy (Legacy)
drivers.notes: Older driver using HTTP interface. Use clickhouse-connect for new deployments.

compatible_databases.name: ClickHouse Cloud
compatible_databases.description: ClickHouse Cloud is the official fully-managed cloud service for ClickHouse. It provides automatic scaling, built-in backups, and enterprise security features.

compatible_databases.name: Altinity.Cloud
compatible_databases.description: Altinity.Cloud is a managed ClickHouse service providing Kubernetes-native deployments with enterprise support.

documentation.description: CockroachDB is a distributed SQL database built for cloud applications.

parameters.host: For localhost: localhost or 127.0.0.1. For AWS: endpoint URL

documentation.notes: The psycopg2 library comes bundled with Superset Docker images.

documentation.description: Couchbase is a distributed NoSQL document database with SQL++ support.

parameters.host: Couchbase host or connection string for cloud

documentation.description: CrateDB is a distributed SQL database for machine data and IoT workloads.
Cloudflare D1 is a serverless SQLite database.
documentation.notes: No additional library needed. SQLite is bundled with Python.

documentation.description: Databend is a modern cloud-native data warehouse with instant elasticity and pay-as-you-go pricing. Built in Rust for high performance.
Apache Hive is a data warehouse infrastructure built on Hadoop.

Databricks is a unified analytics platform built on Apache Spark, providing data engineering, data science, and machine learning capabilities in the cloud. Use the Python Connector for SQL warehouses and clusters.

parameters.access_token: Personal access token from Settings > User Settings
parameters.host: Server hostname from cluster JDBC/ODBC settings
parameters.http_path: HTTP path from cluster JDBC/ODBC settings

drivers.name: Databricks Python Connector (Recommended)
drivers.notes: Official Databricks connector. Best for SQL warehouses and clusters.

drivers.name: Hive Connector (Interactive Clusters)
drivers.notes: For Interactive Clusters. Requires http_path in engine parameters.

drivers.name: ODBC (SQL Endpoints)
drivers.notes: Requires ODBC driver. For serverless SQL warehouses.

drivers.name: databricks-dbapi (Legacy)
drivers.notes: Legacy connector. Use Python Connector for new deployments.

documentation.description: IBM Db2 is a family of data management products for enterprise workloads, available on-premises, in containers, and across cloud platforms.

drivers.name: ibm_db_sa (without LIMIT syntax)
drivers.notes: Use for older DB2 versions without LIMIT [n] syntax. Recommended for SQL Lab.

compatible_databases.name: IBM Db2 for i (AS/400)
compatible_databases.description: Db2 for i is a fully integrated database engine on IBM i (AS/400) systems. Uses a different SQLAlchemy driver optimized for IBM i.

documentation.description: Denodo is a data virtualization platform for logical data management.

drivers.name: psycopg2
drivers.notes: Uses PostgreSQL wire protocol.

documentation.description: Apache Doris is a high-performance real-time analytical database.

drivers.name: mysqlclient
drivers.notes: Recommended driver. May fail with caching_sha2_password auth.

drivers.name: mysql-connector-python
drivers.notes: Required for newer MySQL databases using caching_sha2_password authentication.

documentation.description: Dremio is a data lakehouse platform for fast, self-service analytics.

parameters.token: Personal Access Token (PAT) or API token

drivers.name: ODBC
drivers.notes: Requires Dremio ODBC drivers installed.

documentation.description: Apache Drill is a schema-free SQL query engine for Hadoop and NoSQL.

drivers.name: JDBC
drivers.notes: Requires Drill JDBC Driver installation.

drivers.name: ODBC
drivers.notes: See Apache Drill documentation for ODBC setup.

documentation.description: Apache Druid is a high performance real-time analytics database.

parameters.host: IP address or URL of the host

ssl_configuration.custom_certificate: Add certificate in Root Certificate field. pydruid will automatically use https.

advanced_features.aggregations: Define common aggregations in datasource edit view under List Druid Column tab.
advanced_features.post_aggregations: Create metrics with postagg as Metric Type and provide valid JSON post-aggregation definition.

documentation.notes: A native Druid connector ships with Superset (behind DRUID_IS_ACTIVE flag) but SQLAlchemy connector via pydruid is preferred.

compatible_databases.name: Imply
compatible_databases.description: Imply is a fully-managed cloud platform and enterprise distribution built on Apache Druid. It provides real-time analytics with enterprise security and support.

documentation.description: DuckDB is an in-process OLAP database designed for fast analytical queries on local data. Supports CSV, Parquet, JSON, and many other file formats.
documentation.notes: DuckDB supports both local file and in-memory databases. Use `:memory:` for in-memory database.

compatible_databases.name: MotherDuck
compatible_databases.description: MotherDuck is a serverless cloud analytics platform built on DuckDB, offering collaborative data sharing and cloud-native scalability.

documentation.description: MotherDuck is a serverless cloud analytics platform built on DuckDB. It combines the simplicity of DuckDB with cloud-scale data sharing and collaboration.
documentation.notes: DuckDB supports both local file and in-memory databases. Use `:memory:` for in-memory database.

documentation.description: Amazon DynamoDB is a serverless NoSQL database with SQL via PartiQL.
documentation.notes: Uses PartiQL for SQL queries. Requires connector=superset parameter.

documentation.description: Elasticsearch is a distributed search and analytics engine. Query data using Elasticsearch SQL or OpenSearch SQL syntax.

drivers.name: Elasticsearch SQL API (Recommended)
drivers.notes: For Elastic Cloud and self-hosted Elasticsearch with SQL enabled.

drivers.name: OpenDistro / OpenSearch SQL
drivers.notes: For OpenDistro Elasticsearch or Amazon OpenSearch Service.

compatible_databases.name: Elastic Cloud
compatible_databases.description: Elastic Cloud is the official managed Elasticsearch service from Elastic. It includes Elasticsearch, Kibana, and enterprise features with automatic scaling.

compatible_databases.name: Amazon OpenSearch Service
compatible_databases.description: Amazon OpenSearch Service (successor to Amazon Elasticsearch Service) is a managed search and analytics service on AWS.

documentation.description: Exasol is a high-performance, in-memory, MPP analytical database.

drivers.name: pyodbc
drivers.notes: Requires ODBC driver and DSN configuration.

drivers.name: turbodbc
drivers.notes: Faster but requires additional dependencies.

drivers.name: websocket
drivers.notes: Pure Python, no ODBC required.

documentation.description: Firebird is an open-source relational database.
Firebolt is a cloud data warehouse designed for high-performance analytics.
VMware Greenplum is a massively parallel processing (MPP) database built on PostgreSQL.
documentation.notes: The psycopg2 library comes bundled with Superset Docker images.

documentation.description: Google Sheets allows querying spreadsheets as SQL tables via shillelagh.
documentation.notes: Requires Google service account credentials or OAuth2 authentication. See docs for setup instructions.

documentation.description: SAP HANA is an in-memory relational database and application platform.
Apache Hive is a data warehouse infrastructure built on Hadoop.
Alibaba Cloud Hologres is a real-time interactive analytics service, fully compatible with PostgreSQL 11.

parameters.username: AccessKey ID of your Alibaba Cloud account
parameters.password: AccessKey secret of your Alibaba Cloud account
parameters.host: Public endpoint of the Hologres instance
parameters.port: Port number of the Hologres instance

documentation.notes: Uses the PostgreSQL driver. psycopg2 comes bundled with Superset.

documentation.description: IBM Db2 is a family of data management products for enterprise workloads, available on-premises, in containers, and across cloud platforms.

drivers.name: ibm_db_sa (without LIMIT syntax)
drivers.notes: Use for older DB2 versions without LIMIT [n] syntax. Recommended for SQL Lab.

documentation.description: Apache Impala is an open-source massively parallel processing SQL query engine.
Azure Data Explorer (Kusto) is a fast, fully managed data analytics service from Microsoft Azure. Query data using SQL or native KQL syntax.

drivers.name: SQL Interface (Recommended)
drivers.notes: Use familiar SQL syntax to query Azure Data Explorer.

drivers.name: KQL (Kusto Query Language)
drivers.notes: Use native Kusto Query Language for advanced analytics.

documentation.description: Apache Kylin is an open-source OLAP engine for big data.
MariaDB is a community-developed fork of MySQL.

drivers.name: mysqlclient
drivers.notes: Recommended driver. May fail with caching_sha2_password auth.

drivers.name: mysql-connector-python
drivers.notes: Required for newer MySQL databases using caching_sha2_password authentication.

documentation.notes: Uses the MySQL driver. Fully compatible with MySQL connector.

documentation.description: MonetDB is an open-source column-oriented relational database for high-performance analytics.
Microsoft SQL Server is a relational database management system.

drivers.name: pyodbc
drivers.notes: Connection string must be URL-encoded. Special characters like @ need encoding.

documentation.description: Azure Synapse Analytics is a cloud-based enterprise data warehouse from Microsoft that combines big data and data warehousing.

drivers.name: pyodbc
drivers.notes: Connection string must be URL-encoded. Special characters like @ need encoding.

documentation.description: MySQL is a popular open-source relational database.

drivers.name: mysqlclient
drivers.notes: Recommended driver. May fail with caching_sha2_password auth.

drivers.name: mysql-connector-python
drivers.notes: Required for newer MySQL databases using caching_sha2_password authentication.

compatible_databases.name: MariaDB
compatible_databases.description: MariaDB is a community-developed fork of MySQL, fully compatible with MySQL.

compatible_databases.name: Amazon Aurora MySQL
compatible_databases.description: Amazon Aurora MySQL is a fully managed, MySQL-compatible relational database with up to 5x the throughput of standard MySQL.
compatible_databases.notes: Uses the Data API for serverless access. Standard MySQL connections also work with mysqlclient.

documentation.description: IBM Netezza Performance Server is a data warehouse appliance.
OceanBase is a distributed relational database.

drivers.name: mysqlclient
drivers.notes: Recommended driver. May fail with caching_sha2_password auth.

drivers.name: mysql-connector-python
drivers.notes: Required for newer MySQL databases using caching_sha2_password authentication.

documentation.description: Ocient is a hyperscale data analytics database.
Oracle Database is a multi-model database management system.
documentation.notes: Previously used cx_Oracle, now uses oracledb.

documentation.description: Parseable is a distributed log analytics database with SQL-like query interface.
documentation.notes: Stream name in URI represents the Parseable logstream to query. Supports HTTP (80) and HTTPS (443).

documentation.description: Apache Pinot is a real-time distributed OLAP datastore.

engine_parameters.name: Multi-stage Query Engine
engine_parameters.description: Enable for Explore view, joins, window functions

documentation.description: PostgreSQL is an advanced open-source relational database.

parameters.host: For localhost: localhost or 127.0.0.1. For AWS: endpoint URL

documentation.notes: The psycopg2 library comes bundled with Superset Docker images.

compatible_databases.name: Hologres
compatible_databases.description: Alibaba Cloud real-time interactive analytics service, fully compatible with PostgreSQL 11.

parameters.username: AccessKey ID of your Alibaba Cloud account
parameters.password: AccessKey secret of your Alibaba Cloud account
parameters.host: Public endpoint of the Hologres instance
parameters.port: Port number of the Hologres instance

compatible_databases.name: TimescaleDB
compatible_databases.description: Open-source relational database for time-series and analytics, built on PostgreSQL.
compatible_databases.notes: psycopg2 comes bundled with Superset Docker images.

compatible_databases.name: YugabyteDB
compatible_databases.description: Distributed SQL database built on top of PostgreSQL.
compatible_databases.notes: psycopg2 comes bundled with Superset Docker images.

compatible_databases.name: Amazon Aurora PostgreSQL
compatible_databases.description: Amazon Aurora PostgreSQL is a fully managed, PostgreSQL-compatible relational database with up to 5x the throughput of standard PostgreSQL.
compatible_databases.notes: Uses the Data API for serverless access. Standard PostgreSQL connections also work with psycopg2.

documentation.description: Presto is a distributed SQL query engine for big data.
Amazon Redshift is a fully managed data warehouse service.

drivers.name: redshift_connector
drivers.notes: Supports IAM-based credentials for clusters and serverless.

authentication_methods.name: IAM Credentials (Cluster)
authentication_methods.description: Use IAM-based temporary database credentials for Redshift clusters
authentication_methods.requirements: IAM role must have redshift:GetClusterCredentials permission

authentication_methods.name: IAM Credentials (Serverless)
authentication_methods.description: Use IAM-based credentials for Redshift Serverless
authentication_methods.requirements: IAM role must have redshift-serverless:GetCredentials and redshift-serverless:GetWorkgroup permissions

documentation.description: RisingWave is a distributed streaming database.

parameters.host: For localhost: localhost or 127.0.0.1. For AWS: endpoint URL

documentation.notes: The psycopg2 library comes bundled with Superset Docker images.

documentation.description: Shillelagh is a Python library that allows querying many data sources using SQL, including Google Sheets, CSV files, and APIs.
documentation.notes: Shillelagh uses virtual tables to query external data sources. Google Sheets requires OAuth credentials configured.

documentation.description: SingleStore is a distributed SQL database for real-time analytics and transactions.
Snowflake is a cloud-native data warehouse.

authentication_methods.name: Key Pair Authentication
authentication_methods.description: Use RSA key pair instead of password
authentication_methods.requirements: Key pair must be generated and public key registered in Snowflake
authentication_methods.notes: Merge multi-line private key to one line with \n between lines.

documentation.notes: Schema is not required in connection string. Ensure user has privileges for all databases/schemas/tables/views/warehouses.

documentation.description: Apache Solr is an open-source enterprise search platform.
Apache Spark SQL is a module for structured data processing.
SQLite is a self-contained, serverless SQL database engine.
documentation.notes: No additional library needed. SQLite is bundled with Python.

documentation.description: StarRocks is a high-performance analytical database for real-time analytics.

drivers.name: mysqlclient
drivers.notes: Recommended driver. May fail with caching_sha2_password auth.

drivers.name: mysql-connector-python
drivers.notes: Required for newer MySQL databases using caching_sha2_password authentication.

drivers.name: mysqlclient
drivers.notes: MySQL-compatible driver for StarRocks.

drivers.name: PyMySQL
drivers.notes: Pure Python MySQL driver, no compilation required.

compatible_databases.name: CelerData
compatible_databases.description: CelerData is a fully-managed cloud analytics service built on StarRocks. It provides instant elasticity, automatic scaling, and enterprise features.

documentation.description: Superset meta database is an experimental feature that enables querying across multiple configured databases using a single connection.
documentation.notes: This is an internal Superset feature. Enable with ENABLE_SUPERSET_META_DB feature flag. Allows cross-database queries using virtual tables.

documentation.description: SAP ASE (formerly Sybase) is an enterprise relational database.

drivers.name: pyodbc
drivers.notes: Connection string must be URL-encoded. Special characters like @ need encoding.

parameters.dsn: ODBC Data Source Name configured for SAP ASE

documentation.notes: Requires SAP ASE ODBC driver installed and configured as a DSN.

documentation.description: TDengine is a high-performance time-series database for IoT.
Teradata is an enterprise data warehouse platform.

drivers.name: teradatasqlalchemy (Recommended)
drivers.notes: No ODBC drivers required.

drivers.name: sqlalchemy-teradata (ODBC)
drivers.notes: Requires ODBC driver installation.

documentation.description: TimescaleDB is an open-source relational database for time-series and analytics, built on PostgreSQL.
documentation.notes: Uses the PostgreSQL driver. psycopg2 comes bundled with Superset.

documentation.description: Trino is a distributed SQL query engine for big data analytics.

compatible_databases.name: Starburst Galaxy
compatible_databases.description: Starburst Galaxy is a fully-managed cloud analytics platform built on Trino. It provides data lake analytics with enterprise security and governance.

compatible_databases.name: Starburst Enterprise
compatible_databases.description: Starburst Enterprise is a self-managed Trino distribution with enterprise features, security, and support.

documentation.description: Vertica is a column-oriented analytics database.

parameters.host: localhost, IP address, or hostname (cloud or on-prem)

documentation.notes: Supports load balancer backup host configuration.

documentation.description: YDB is a distributed SQL database by Yandex.
YugabyteDB is a distributed SQL database built on top of PostgreSQL.
